(Requires attunement by a creature. The properties of this item are affixed to a magical item.)

This item is a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.nniVtdJB1oyk5Sa3]{locus}.

While attuned, the enchanter's unburdening magically merges with a magical item of your choice. This can be done during a short or long rest, and requires 10 minutes to complete.

Effect: When affixed to a magical item that has no other Loci affixed to it and it would require attunement, the magical item no longer requires attunement.

Special: No other loci can affix to the magic item this loci is affixed to.

Foundry Note

When you attach this locus to a magical item, you will have to manually edit the item to remove its attunement requirement.
